_header: I believe in God Father in heaven

CULGg432.First Lines:
Y bileue in god fader in heueneAlmighti þat in dayes
                    seuene…
CULGg432.Last Lines:
…And on þe lif wiþ outen indingeJhesu crist vs
                    þider bringe Amen
CULGg432.Editions:
Wright,  Thomas,  and  James Orchard Halliwell-Phillipps, eds.  
             Reliquiae Antiquae.
         2 vols. London: Smith, 1845: 1.160-1.
